name: ghost
material: {"word":"ghost","head_zh":"鬼魂、幽靈","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"The spirit of a dead person that someone thinks they can see or feel.","definition_zh":"死人的靈魂，有些人認為他們能看到或感受到。","examples":["I saw a ghost in my house! (我在我家看到一個鬼魂！)","Some people say ghosts are scary. (有些人說鬼魂很可怕。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"ghostly","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: alone
material: {"word":"alone","head_zh":"獨自、單獨","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"When you are the only person in a place.","definition_zh":"只有你一個人在某個地方。","examples":["I am alone at home. (我獨自一人在家。)","She likes to be alone sometimes. (她有時候喜歡一個人。)"]},{"pos":"adverb","definition_en":"Without any other people.","definition_zh":"沒有其他人的情況下。","examples":["He went to the store alone. (他獨自去商店。)","She walked home alone. (她獨自走回家。)"]}],"related_forms":[]}

name: given
material: {"word":"given","head_zh":"給予、贈送","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past participle of 'give': to offer something to someone.","definition_zh":"動詞 'give' 的過去分詞：提供某物給某人。","examples":["I have given him my book. (我已經給了他我的書。)","She was given a present. (她收到了一份禮物。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"give","pos":"verb"}]}

name: throne
material: {"word":"throne","head_zh":"王位、寶座","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A special chair for a king or queen.","definition_zh":"國王或女王坐的特殊椅子。","examples":["The king sits on his throne. (國王坐在他的寶座上。)","The throne is made of gold. (這個寶座是用黃金做的。)"]}],"related_forms":[]}

name: know
material: {"word":"know","head_zh":"知道、了解","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To have information in your mind.","definition_zh":"腦海裡有資訊。","examples":["I know his name. (我知道他的名字。)","Do you know the answer? (你知道答案嗎？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"knew","pos":"verb"},{"form":"known","pos":"verb"}]}

name: believe
material: {"word":"believe","head_zh":"相信、認為","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To think that something is true.","definition_zh":"認為某事是真的。","examples":["I believe you. (我相信你。)","Do you believe in ghosts? (你相信有鬼嗎？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"believed","pos":"verb"}]}

name: queen
material: {"word":"queen","head_zh":"女王、皇后","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A woman who is the ruler of a country.","definition_zh":"一個國家的女性統治者。","examples":["The queen lives in a palace. (女王住在宮殿裡。)","She is the queen of England. (她是英國女王。)"]}],"related_forms":[]}

name: meant
material: {"word":"meant","head_zh":"意味、意指","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past tense of 'mean': to express something.","definition_zh":"動詞 'mean' 的過去式：表達某事。","examples":["I meant to call you. (我本來想打電話給你。)","What does this word meant? (這個字是什麼意思？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"mean","pos":"verb"}]}

name: lived
material: {"word":"lived","head_zh":"居住、生活","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past tense of 'live': to stay in a place.","definition_zh":"動詞 'live' 的過去式：待在某個地方。","examples":["I lived in Taipei last year. (我去年住在台北。)","They lived in a big house. (他們住在一間大房子裡。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"live","pos":"verb"}]}

name: two
material: {"word":"two","head_zh":"二、兩個","entries":[{"pos":"number","definition_en":"The number after one.","definition_zh":"一之後的數字。","examples":["I have two apples. (我有兩個蘋果。)","One plus one is two. (一加一是二。)"]}],"related_forms":[]}

name: lives
material: {"word":"lives","head_zh":"生活、居住","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"More than one life.","definition_zh":"生命的複數形式，指多個生命。","examples":["Cats have nine lives, they say.","據說貓有九條命。","Many lives were saved by the firefighters.","消防員拯救了許多生命。"]},{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To exist or stay in a place.","definition_zh":"生存，居住在某地。","examples":["She lives in Taipei.","她住在台北。","My grandmother lives with us.","我的祖母和我們住在一起。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"live","pos":"verb"},{"form":"life","pos":"noun"},{"form":"living","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: tried
material: {"word":"tried","head_zh":"嘗試、努力","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past tense of 'try', to make an effort to do something.","definition_zh":"動詞 'try' 的過去式，表示努力做某事。","examples":["I tried to open the door, but it was locked.","我試圖打開門，但是鎖住了。","He tried his best to win the game.","他盡力贏得比賽。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"try","pos":"verb"},{"form":"trying","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: play
material: {"word":"play","head_zh":"玩耍、播放、戲劇","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To do things for fun; to use a musical instrument; to make a CD, DVD etc. work.","definition_zh":"為了樂趣而做的事情；彈奏樂器；播放CD、DVD等。","examples":["The children play in the park every day.","孩子們每天在公園裡玩耍。","Can you play the guitar?","你會彈吉他嗎？"]},{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"Activity for enjoyment; a dramatic work for the theatre.","definition_zh":"為了享受的活動；為劇場創作的戲劇作品。","examples":["We watched a play at the theater.","我們在劇院看了一齣戲。","Play is important for children's development.","玩耍對兒童的發展很重要。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"playing","pos":"verb"},{"form":"player","pos":"noun"},{"form":"playful","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: sides
material: {"word":"sides","head_zh":"邊、面","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"The edges or surfaces of something; different points of view.","definition_zh":"物體的邊緣或表面；不同的觀點。","examples":["The box has six sides.","這個盒子有六個面。","There are two sides to every story.","每件事都有兩面。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"side","pos":"noun"},{"form":"sideways","pos":"adverb"}]}

name: could
material: {"word":"could","head_zh":"能夠、可以","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past tense of 'can', used to show ability or possibility in the past.","definition_zh":"'can' 的過去式，用來表示過去的能力或可能性。","examples":["When I was young, I could run very fast.","當我年輕的時候，我跑得很快。","It could rain tomorrow.","明天可能會下雨。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"can","pos":"verb"}]}

name: find
material: {"word":"find","head_zh":"尋找、發現","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To discover or locate something.","definition_zh":"發現或找到某事物。","examples":["I can't find my keys.","我找不到我的鑰匙。","Did you find the book you were looking for?","你找到你要找的書了嗎？"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"finding","pos":"noun"},{"form":"found","pos":"verb"}]}

name: place
material: {"word":"place","head_zh":"地方、放置","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A location or area.","definition_zh":"一個地點或區域。","examples":["This is a nice place to eat.","這裡是個吃飯的好地方。","What is your favorite place in the city?","你在城市裡最喜歡的地方是什麼？"]},{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To put something in a specific location.","definition_zh":"將某物放在特定位置。","examples":["Please place the book on the table.","請把書放在桌子上。","She placed her bag on the floor.","她把包放在地板上。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"placing","pos":"verb"},{"form":"placed","pos":"verb"}]}

name: called
material: {"word":"called","head_zh":"叫做、稱為、打電話","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past tense of 'call', to give someone or something a name; to telephone someone.","definition_zh":"'call'的過去式，給某人或某物一個名字；打電話給某人。","examples":["My dog is called Lucky.","我的狗叫做Lucky。","I called my mother yesterday.","我昨天打電話給我的母親。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"call","pos":"verb"},{"form":"calling","pos":"verb"}]}

name: problem
material: {"word":"problem","head_zh":"問題","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A situation that causes difficulties or concerns.","definition_zh":"引起困難或擔憂的情況。","examples":["We have a problem with the car.","我們的車有問題。","What is the biggest problem in your life?","你生活中最大的問題是什麼？"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"problems","pos":"noun"},{"form":"problematic","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: child
material: {"word":"child","head_zh":"小孩、兒童","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A young person.","definition_zh":"一個年輕的人。","examples":["She has one child, a daughter.","她有一個孩子，是個女兒。","Children like to play games.","孩子們喜歡玩遊戲。"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"children","pos":"noun"},{"form":"childhood","pos":"noun"},{"form":"childish","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: got
material: {"word":"got","head_zh":"得到、獲得","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To receive or obtain something.","definition_zh":"收到或獲得某物。","examples":["I got a new toy for my birthday. (我生日時收到了一個新玩具。)","She got a good grade on her test. (她考試得了好成績。)","We got tickets to the movie. (我們買到電影票了。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"get","pos":"verb"},{"form":"getting","pos":"verb"}]}

name: wild
material: {"word":"wild","head_zh":"野生的、狂野的","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Living in nature, not tame.","definition_zh":"生活在野外，未被馴服的。","examples":["A wild animal lives in the forest. (野生動物住在森林裡。)","The wind is wild today. (今天的風很大。)","He has a wild imagination. (他有著狂野的想像力。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"wildly","pos":"adverb"},{"form":"wildness","pos":"noun"}]}

name: getting
material: {"word":"getting","head_zh":"正在得到、變得","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"The act of receiving or becoming.","definition_zh":"接收或變成的動作。","examples":["I am getting ready for school. (我正在準備上學。)","It is getting cold outside. (外面正在變冷。)","She is getting a new bike. (她要得到一輛新腳踏車。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"get","pos":"verb"},{"form":"got","pos":"verb"}]}

name: paid
material: {"word":"paid","head_zh":"支付、已付款的","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To give money for something.","definition_zh":"為了某物而付出金錢。","examples":["I paid for the groceries. (我付了雜貨的錢。)","She gets paid every week. (她每週都會領到薪水。)","Have you paid the bill yet? (你付帳單了嗎？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"pay","pos":"verb"},{"form":"paying","pos":"verb"}]}

name: stage
material: {"word":"stage","head_zh":"舞台、階段","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A platform where people perform.","definition_zh":"人們表演的平台。","examples":["The actors are on the stage. (演員們在舞台上。)","The band played on a big stage. (樂隊在一個大舞台上演奏。)","I saw a play on the stage. (我在舞台上看了一齣戲。)"]},{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A period or step in a process.","definition_zh":"過程中的一個時期或步驟。","examples":["The project is in the first stage. (這個專案處於第一階段。)","This is a difficult stage in my life. (這是我人生中困難的階段。)","What's the next stage of the plan? (計畫的下一個階段是什麼？)"]},{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To organize and present a play or event.","definition_zh":"組織和呈現一場戲劇或活動。","examples":["The school will stage a play next month. (學校下個月將上演一齣戲劇。)","They staged a protest outside the building. (他們在建築物外舉行了抗議活動。)","The company staged a product launch event. (公司舉辦了產品發布會。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"staged","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: done
material: {"word":"done","head_zh":"完成的、結束的","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Finished or completed.","definition_zh":"完成的或結束的。","examples":["I am done with my homework. (我的作業做完了。)","The game is done. (遊戲結束了。)","Are you done eating? (你吃完了嗎？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"do","pos":"verb"},{"form":"doing","pos":"verb"}]}

name: hiding
material: {"word":"hiding","head_zh":"躲藏、隱藏","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To put something or oneself where it cannot be seen.","definition_zh":"將某物或自己放置在看不見的地方。","examples":["The cat is hiding under the bed. (貓躲在床底下。)","He is hiding his toys. (他正在藏他的玩具。)","She is good at hiding things. (她很擅長藏東西。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"hide","pos":"verb"},{"form":"hidden","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: shining
material: {"word":"shining","head_zh":"閃耀、發光","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Giving out a bright light.","definition_zh":"發出明亮的光芒。","examples":["The sun is shining brightly. (太陽閃耀著光芒。)","Her eyes are shining with joy. (她的眼睛閃耀著喜悅的光芒。)","The stars are shining in the sky. (星星在天空中閃耀。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"shine","pos":"verb"},{"form":"shiny","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: like
material: {"word":"like","head_zh":"喜歡、像","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To enjoy or be fond of something.","definition_zh":"喜歡或喜愛某物。","examples":["I like ice cream. (我喜歡冰淇淋。)","She likes to read books. (她喜歡讀書。)","Do you like playing games? (你喜歡玩遊戲嗎？)"]},{"pos":"preposition","definition_en":"Similar to something else.","definition_zh":"與其他東西相似。","examples":["He is like his father. (他像他的父親。)","She sings like an angel. (她唱歌像天使一樣。)","It looks like rain. (看起來好像要下雨了。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"liked","pos":"verb"},{"form":"liking","pos":"verb"}]}

name: born
material: {"word":"born","head_zh":"出生的","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Brought into life.","definition_zh":"被帶到生命中、出生。","examples":["I was born in Taiwan. (我出生在台灣。)","She was born on July 4th. (她出生在七月四日。)","My brother was born last year. (我的弟弟去年出生。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"bear","pos":"verb"},{"form":"birth","pos":"noun"}]}

name: dreaming
material: {"word":"dreaming","head_zh":"做夢、夢想","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To experience images, thoughts, or feelings while you are sleeping.","definition_zh":"在睡覺時體驗到的影像、想法或感覺。","examples":["I was dreaming about you last night. (我昨晚夢到你了。)","She is dreaming of becoming a famous singer. (她夢想成為一位著名的歌手。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"dream","pos":"noun"},{"form":"dream","pos":"verb"},{"form":"dreamt","pos":"verb"},{"form":"dreamy","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: hard
material: {"word":"hard","head_zh":"困難的、努力地","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Not easy to do or understand.","definition_zh":"不容易做或理解的。","examples":["This test is very hard. (這個考試非常難。)","It's hard to believe it's already July. (很難相信已經七月了。)"]},{"pos":"adverb","definition_en":"With a lot of effort.","definition_zh":"非常努力地。","examples":["He worked hard to pass the exam. (他努力讀書通過考試。)","It's raining hard. (雨下得很大。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"hardly","pos":"adverb"},{"form":"hardness","pos":"noun"}]}

name: came
material: {"word":"came","head_zh":"來","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past tense of 'come'. To move or travel towards a place or person.","definition_zh":"「come」的過去式。朝向一個地方或人移動或旅行。","examples":["She came to my house yesterday. (她昨天來我家了。)","The bus came late. (巴士來晚了。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"come","pos":"verb"},{"form":"coming","pos":"verb"}]}

name: far
material: {"word":"far","head_zh":"遠的","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"A long distance away.","definition_zh":"距離很長的。","examples":["My house is far from here. (我的家離這裡很遠。)","We walked a far distance. (我們走了很遠的距離。)"]},{"pos":"adverb","definition_en":"To a great distance; a long way.","definition_zh":"到很遠的距離；很遠的路。","examples":["He traveled far to see her. (他遠道而來見她。)","How far is the airport? (機場有多遠？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"farther","pos":"adjective"},{"form":"farthest","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: going
material: {"word":"going","head_zh":"去","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Moving or travelling to a place.","definition_zh":"移動或前往某個地方。","examples":["I am going to the store. (我要去商店。)","She is going to study abroad. (她要出國留學。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"go","pos":"verb"},{"form":"gone","pos":"verb"}]}

name: moment
material: {"word":"moment","head_zh":"片刻、瞬間","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A very short period of time.","definition_zh":"非常短的時間。","examples":["Wait a moment, please. (請稍等一下。)","I'll be there in a moment. (我馬上就到。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"moments","pos":"noun"},{"form":"momentary","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: together
material: {"word":"together","head_zh":"一起","entries":[{"pos":"adverb","definition_en":"With another person or people.","definition_zh":"與另一個人或人們。","examples":["Let's go to the movies together. (我們一起去看電影吧。)","They worked together on the project. (他們一起完成了這個專案。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"togetherness","pos":"noun"}]}

name: glowing
material: {"word":"glowing","head_zh":"發光的、容光煥發的","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To produce a soft, warm light.","definition_zh":"發出柔和溫暖的光芒。","examples":["The candles were glowing in the dark. (蠟燭在黑暗中發光。)","Her face was glowing with happiness. (她的臉上容光煥發，充滿幸福。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"glow","pos":"noun"},{"form":"glow","pos":"verb"}]}

name: golden
material: {"word":"golden","head_zh":"金色的、珍貴的","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Made of gold or having the color of gold; very valuable or special.","definition_zh":"用黃金製成的或具有黃金的顏色；非常珍貴或特別。","examples":["She wore a golden necklace. (她戴著一條金色的項鍊。)","This is a golden opportunity. (這是一個千載難逢的機會。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"gold","pos":"noun"}]}

name: voices
material: {"word":"voices","head_zh":"聲音","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"The sound that you make when you speak or sing.","definition_zh":"你說話或唱歌時發出的聲音。","examples":["I heard voices in the other room. (我聽到另一個房間裡有聲音。)","She has a beautiful singing voice. (她有著美麗的歌聲。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"voice","pos":"noun"},{"form":"voice","pos":"verb"}]}

name: time
material: {"word":"time","head_zh":"時間","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"Something that can be measured in minutes, hours, days, etc.","definition_zh":"可以用分鐘、小時、天等單位來計算的東西。","examples":["What time is it? (現在幾點？)","I don't have much time. (我沒有太多時間。)","We had a good time at the party. (我們在派對上玩得很開心。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"times","pos":"noun"}]}

name: fears
material: {"word":"fears","head_zh":"恐懼、害怕","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"Unpleasant feeling caused by being aware of danger.","definition_zh":"因意識到危險而產生的不愉快感覺。","examples":["He has many fears about the future. (他對未來有很多恐懼。)","My biggest fear is spiders. (我最大的恐懼是蜘蛛。)","She overcame her fears and gave a speech. (她克服了恐懼並發表了演講。)"]},{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To be afraid of someone or something.","definition_zh":"害怕某人或某事。","examples":["I fear that it will rain today. (我擔心今天會下雨。)","She fears losing her job. (她害怕失去工作。)","Don't fear! I'm here to help. (別害怕！我在這裡幫助你。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"fear","pos":"noun"},{"form":"fearful","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: lies
material: {"word":"lies","head_zh":"謊言、說謊","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"Something that is not true; a false statement.","definition_zh":"不真實的事物；虛假的陳述。","examples":["He told me a lie. (他對我說謊。)","Don't tell lies. (不要說謊。)","I know it's a lie. (我知道那是謊言。)"]},{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To say something that is not true.","definition_zh":"說一些不真實的事情。","examples":["He lies all the time. (他總是說謊。)","Don't lie to me! (不要對我說謊！)","She lied about her age. (她謊報了年齡。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"lying","pos":"verb"},{"form":"liar","pos":"noun"}]}

name: waited
material: {"word":"waited","head_zh":"等待","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"Past simple of 'wait'. To stay in a place until something happens.","definition_zh":"「wait」的過去式。停留在某地直到某事發生。","examples":["I waited for you for an hour. (我等你一個小時了。)","She waited at the bus stop. (她在公車站等候。)","We waited for the rain to stop. (我們等雨停。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"wait","pos":"verb"},{"form":"waiting","pos":"verb"}]}

name: long
material: {"word":"long","head_zh":"長的、很久","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Measuring a great distance from end to end.","definition_zh":"從一端到另一端測量很長的距離。","examples":["That is a long road. (那是一條很長的路。)","She has long hair. (她有長頭髮。)","The movie was very long. (這部電影很長。)"]},{"pos":"adverb","definition_en":"For a great amount of time.","definition_zh":"持續很長的時間。","examples":["I will be gone for long. (我會離開很久。)","He waited long for her call. (他等了很久才等到她的電話。)","Have you lived here long? (你在這裡住很久了嗎？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"longer","pos":"adjective"},{"form":"longest","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: break
material: {"word":"break","head_zh":"打破、休息","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To damage something so that it is in pieces.","definition_zh":"損壞某物，使其變成碎片。","examples":["Don't break the glass. (不要打破玻璃。)","I broke my leg. (我摔斷了腿。)","Be careful not to break it. (小心不要弄壞它。)"]},{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A time when you stop working or doing something to rest.","definition_zh":"停止工作或做某事以休息的時間。","examples":["Let's take a break. (我們休息一下吧。)","I need a coffee break. (我需要一個喝咖啡的休息時間。)","We have a 10-minute break. (我們有10分鐘的休息時間。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"broken","pos":"adjective"},{"form":"breaking","pos":"verb"}]}

name: walls
material: {"word":"walls","head_zh":"牆壁","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"The sides of a room or building.","definition_zh":"房間或建築物的側面。","examples":["The walls are painted white. (牆壁漆成白色。)","There are pictures on the walls. (牆上有照片。)","He built a wall around the garden. (他在花園周圍建了一道牆。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"wall","pos":"noun"}]}

name: wake
material: {"word":"wake","head_zh":"醒來","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To stop sleeping.","definition_zh":"停止睡覺。","examples":["I wake up at 7 am every day. (我每天早上7點醒來。)","She wakes up early. (她很早醒來。)","Wake up! It's time to go. (醒醒！該走了。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"waking","pos":"verb"},{"form":"woke","pos":"verb"},{"form":"awake","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: feel
material: {"word":"feel","head_zh":"感覺","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To experience an emotion or physical sensation.","definition_zh":"體驗一種情緒或身體感覺。","examples":["I feel happy. (我感到快樂。)","I feel cold. (我感覺冷。)","How do you feel today? (你今天感覺怎麼樣？)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"feeling","pos":"noun"},{"form":"felt","pos":"verb"}]}

name: put
material: {"word":"put","head_zh":"放置、放","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To move something to a certain place.","definition_zh":"將某物移動到某個地方。","examples":["Put the book on the table. (把書放在桌子上。)","Where did you put my keys? (你把我的鑰匙放在哪裡了？)","Please put your bag here. (請把你的包放在這裡。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"putting","pos":"verb"}]}

name: patterns
material: {"word":"patterns","head_zh":"模式、樣式","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A repeated way in which something happens or is arranged.","definition_zh":"重複出現或排列的方式。","examples":["The wallpaper has a pattern of flowers on it. (壁紙上有花的圖案。)","We are seeing similar patterns in the stock market this week. (這週我們在股市中看到了相似的模式。)","She noticed a pattern of behavior in her friend. (她注意到她朋友的行為模式。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"patterned","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: past
material: {"word":"past","head_zh":"過去","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"The time before now.","definition_zh":"現在之前的時間。","examples":["In the past, people didn't have computers. (在過去，人們沒有電腦。)","Let's forget about the past and focus on the future. (讓我們忘記過去，專注於未來。)","She has a lot of experience in her past job. (她在過去的工作中有很多經驗。)"]},{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Happened or existed before now.","definition_zh":"之前發生或存在的。","examples":["This is a photo of my past boyfriend. (這是我過去的男朋友的照片。)","We need to learn from past mistakes. (我們需要從過去的錯誤中學習。)","She is a past president of the club. (她是俱樂部的前任主席。)"]},{"pos":"preposition","definition_en":"Further than.","definition_zh":"超過…；越過…","examples":["The shop is just past the post office. (商店就在郵局的後面。)","It's half past three. (現在三點半。)","I walked past the school. (我走過了學校。)"]}],"related_forms":[]}

name: finally
material: {"word":"finally","head_zh":"最終、終於","entries":[{"pos":"adverb","definition_en":"After a long time or some difficulty.","definition_zh":"經過很長一段時間或一些困難之後。","examples":["We finally arrived at the hotel. (我們終於到達了飯店。)","After searching for hours, I finally found my keys. (搜尋了好幾個小時後，我終於找到了我的鑰匙。)","She finally decided to accept the job offer. (她最終決定接受這份工作。) "]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"final","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: live
material: {"word":"live","head_zh":"居住、生活；現場直播的","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To have your home somewhere.","definition_zh":"在某個地方有你的家。","examples":["I live in Taipei. (我住在台北。)","Where do you live? (你住在哪裡？)","They live in a small apartment. (他們住在一間小公寓裡。)"]},{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Happening now, not recorded.","definition_zh":"現在正在發生的，沒有錄製的。","examples":["We watched a live concert on TV. (我們在電視上看了一場現場演唱會。)","The news was broadcast live. (新聞是現場直播的。)","I prefer live music to recorded music. (我更喜歡現場音樂而不是錄製的音樂。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"living","pos":"noun"},{"form":"alive","pos":"adjective"}]}

name: girl
material: {"word":"girl","head_zh":"女孩","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"A female child.","definition_zh":"女性兒童。","examples":["She is a young girl. (她是一個年輕的女孩。)","The girl is playing with a doll. (這個女孩正在玩洋娃娃。)","My daughter is a girl. (我的女兒是個女孩。)"]}],"related_forms":[]}

name: see
material: {"word":"see","head_zh":"看見、理解","entries":[{"pos":"verb","definition_en":"To notice someone or something by using your eyes.","definition_zh":"用眼睛注意到某人或某物。","examples":["I can see the mountains from my window. (我從我的窗戶可以看到山。)","Did you see that movie? (你看過那部電影了嗎？)","I see what you mean. (我明白你的意思了。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"seeing","pos":"noun"},{"form":"saw","pos":"verb"},{"form":"seen","pos":"verb"}]}

name: hunters
material: {"word":"hunters","head_zh":"獵人","entries":[{"pos":"noun","definition_en":"People who hunt animals for food or sport.","definition_zh":"為了食物或運動而獵捕動物的人。","examples":["The hunters went into the forest. (獵人們進入了森林。)","Some hunters use dogs to help them find animals. (有些獵人使用狗來幫助他們找到動物。)","These days it's often illegal to be hunters of wild animals.(現在，獵捕野生動物通常是非法的。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"hunt","pos":"verb"},{"form":"hunter","pos":"noun"}]}

name: strong
material: {"word":"strong","head_zh":"強壯的","entries":[{"pos":"adjective","definition_en":"Having a lot of physical power.","definition_zh":"擁有很大的體力。","examples":["He is a very strong man. (他是個非常強壯的男人。)","This coffee is too strong. (這咖啡太濃了。)","She has a strong opinion about the matter. (她對這件事有強烈的意見。)"]}],"related_forms":[{"form":"strongly","pos":"adverb"},{"form":"strength","pos":"noun"}]}
